had no legal claim to it. The SCA, which Zahi Hawass heads, said in an email that its request had been approved by both Prime Minister Ahmed Nazif and the Egyptian ministry of culture. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti bust... want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
